events.title: Stanford University
events.description: A master student in computer science, I focused on artificial intelligence and human-computer interaction. In Winter 2013, I TA-ed CS 231A, "Computer Vision: from 3D reconstruction to recognition".

events.title: Google
events.description: As a software engineer intern at Google Taipei, I worked on Chrome OS project and visualized kernel function calls of its graphics driver.

events.title: JustFont
events.description: I joined JustFont, a leading startup providing Chinese webfont service, as a software engineer intern. I was responsible for developing an online webfont editor and maintaining JustFont's website.

events.title: National Taiwan University
events.description: Majoring in electrical engineering, I explored extensively in fields spanning from hardware to software. Some examples included solar cells, semiconductors, microcontroller, bio-engineering, and image processing.

projects.title: SNAP
projects.description: Joining the Stanford Network Analysis Project (SNAP) team led by Jure, I did research on SNAP by implementing RolX, an algorithm able to extract roles of nodes in a large network, with Python and C++.

projects.title: Synckr
projects.description: With intuitive interface and integration of Google calendar, Synckr makes event scheduling easier than ever. I was responsible for backend development with Node.js and MongoDB.

projects.title: Automatic Aesthetic Photo-rating System
projects.description: To help photographers taking pictures, we built a system that rates the aesthetic of photos with accuracy as high as 82%, utilizing computer vision and machine learning techniques. My responsibility was generating aesthetic features from various photographic principles with OpenCV and C++.

projects.title: Graphics Driver Evaluation of Chrome OS
projects.description: In this intern project at Google, I worked on visualizing kernel function calls and performance evaluation of graphics driver. Using C in Linux kernel, Python for automated test, Javascript for visualization, and BASH script to enable system tracing, I contributed 4 change lists to the Chrome OS codebase.

projects.title: Online Webfont Editor
projects.description: Webfont is a technology that displays font on websites without client side installing that font beforehand. To help web designer applying webfont on their websites, I developed from scratch an online WYSIWYG webfont editor, written in PHP and Javascript.

projects.title: IPC2581 to Gerber Converter
projects.description: IPC2581 is a newly-introduced format of Printed Circuit Board (PCB) files. I developed this program to convert IPC2581 to Gerber, a more widely-used format of PCB files.
